definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: The peeled eggs are completely natural and provide customers with convenience and ease of use.
sentences.chinese: 白煮采用提桶或真空包装，给用户提供方便和快捷。

sentences.english: Make a cut in the shape of a cross in the bag with a cutter flamed .
sentences.chinese: 用火焰切割器在包装上切开一个十字形切口。

sentences.english: But sometimes DHL they will diverge parcel inspection, then their own packaging.
sentences.chinese: 但有时DHL他们会岔开包裹检查，然后自己包装。

sentences.english: Invoiced packaging on loan will not be paid for; it will be returned carriage paid.
sentences.chinese: 包装费不单独支付，而是与运费一起支付。

sentences.english: Our packing is in Chinese national style , and suitable for display in super-market.
sentences.chinese: 我们的包装具有中国民族风格，适于在超级市场陈列。

sentences.english: We would suggest that you strengthen the cartons with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我方建议用两根包装带加固纸板箱。

sentences.english: There're many ecial rules for mailing packages regarding size and how they're packed.
sentences.chinese: 是的，包裹的大小和包装法有许多特殊的规定。

sentences.english: Make sure that fish or other seafood are wrapped and use as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 切记鱼或其他海鲜要包装好，并且尽快食用。

sentences.english: Raw materials and Packaging materials warehouses are located in rooms W2 and W7, respectively.
sentences.chinese: 原材料和包装材料仓库分别位于W2和W7室。

sentences.english: Do you think the packaging of Yakult is acceptable?
sentences.chinese: 你认为益力多的包装合理吗？

sentences.english: The plant has been designed to treat incoming waste of a wide cross-section of physical properties and packaging.
sentences.chinese: 根据设计，工厂可以处理不同属性和包装的废料。

sentences.english: Spare parts shall be packed separately from the vessels.
sentences.chinese: 备件应同容器分开包装。

sentences.english: Suitable for packing materials with fine flowability.
sentences.chinese: 适用于流动性好的颗粒料的包装。

sentences.english: B: These are the various kinds of packing for pliers.
sentences.chinese: 这些是钳子的各种包装。

sentences.english: How did you think about"Luxe Pack in Green" area?
sentences.chinese: 您认为“奢侈品包装的绿色革命”特区的展示如何？

sentences.english: This packaging is a real treat.

definition: to divide into portions/to package in smaller quantities/to separate into loads
date of use (on foodstuffs)/best before date
to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
